title: XSeg training error when using backup function
body:
During Xseg training, when i press the "b" key on my keyboard to make a backup, i always get this error (no problems during training models): maybe because it search for "xseg_xseg_256_opt.npy" where the word "xseg" is repeated two times IDK...


=============== Model Summary ===============
==                                         ==
==        Model name: XSeg                 ==
==                                         ==
== Current iteration: 36                   ==
==                                         ==
==------------- Model Options -------------==
==                                         ==
==         face_type: wf                   ==
==        batch_size: 4                    ==
==                                         ==
==-------------- Running On ---------------==
==                                         ==
==      Device index: 0                    ==
==              Name: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB ==
==              VRAM: 4.74GB               ==
==                                         ==
=============================================
Starting. Press "Enter" to stop training and save model.
Error: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'F:\\DeepFaceLab\\workspace\\model\\XSeg_XSeg_256_opt.npy'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "F:\DeepFaceLab\_internal\DeepFaceLab\mainscripts\Trainer.py", line 192, in trainerThread
    model_backup()
  File "F:\DeepFaceLab\_internal\DeepFaceLab\mainscripts\Trainer.py", line 79, in model_backup
    model.create_backup()
  File "F:\DeepFaceLab\_internal\DeepFaceLab\models\ModelBase.py", line 435, in create_backup
    shutil.copy ( str(filename), str(idx_backup_path / Path(filename).name) )
  File "shutil.py", line 245, in copy
  File "shutil.py", line 120, in copyfile
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'F:\\DeepFaceLab\\workspace\\model\\XSeg_XSeg_256_opt.npy'
Done.
